title: Implement Correlation Between Metrics, Logs, and Traces
description: Implement correlation between metrics, logs, and traces.

effort_estimate.justification: Correlation between metrics, logs, and traces provides a holistic view of system behavior and helps in root cause analysis.

user_stories: As a developer, I want to correlate metrics, logs, and traces so that I can quickly identify the root cause of issues.
business_rules: Trace ID injection must be implemented in logs.
Exemplars configuration must be implemented to link metrics to traces.
Unified dashboards must be created to visualize correlated data.
Context propagation must be implemented to ensure trace IDs are propagated across services.
edge_cases: Minimizing the overhead of context propagation.

acceptance_criteria: Trace ID injection is implemented in logs.

blocking_information.can_start_date: After INF-005-A, INF-005-B, and INF-005-C are completed

additional_context.technical_notes: Ensure metrics, logs, and traces are properly correlated.
additional_context.security_considerations: Secure the correlated data to prevent unauthorized access.
